guildcraftCommandScheduler.main

Class CommandDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • guildcraftCommandScheduler.main.CommandDatabase

  • public class CommandDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    The Database class interfaces with the command database by opening / closing the connection, fetching all un-executed commands and executing commands.
    Author:
    Jonodonozym
